I'm #speaking this Sunday at AIGA Arizona #PHXDW.
The topic of course, is all things #presentations, but for specifics check out my #linkedinvideo
Anyone else want to escape corporate America?  Join me for free webinar, starting @ 9pm Eastern.

By referral only.  "Hands on coaching for faster results"Whether you are struggling with the implementation of Lean Startup, customer development, rapid experimentation, innovation of new products, business models, or you just want to increase sales and profits...I solve that.Lean Startup works inside the enterprise. From startups to $200B global companies, I have helped every size, shape and market. You just need a coach that understands how to translate and overcome the inherent road blocks that are created in a large corporate environment.As an expert in Lean Startup methodologies and building new revenue streams, I provide hands on coaching that delivers "the missing link" between what you have read and "how it works in the real world".If you are looking to have a breakthrough moment and get significant results (the kind of results that are a trademark moment in your career) with either product innovation or (and) profitability... I'm the guy you want to hire.Prices start at $5k for speaking engagements, and $10k per day for joining your team as an active participant / coach.

Wopodo used DISC to match employee personality with company culture.  Wopodo was like eHarmony for job search and matched job seekers and employers on more than 80 dimensions of workplace compatibility.

First SaaS platform.  Hired award winning team to create the first native web platform for web applications.  A great idea before its time.Signed up Google, Salesforce.com, and 20 other ISV's to integrate into our platform.Invested millions personally.  Got caught in the dot bomb tidal wave.  Many personal and business lessons learned.

recommendations: Crystal Taggart, MBA
Bots and AI
October 24, 2017, Crystal was a client of Richard’s

Rick Swanson is a very talented startup coach who has helped me with tools and techniques to get to startup success. He's constantly studying startup education available on the market (lean startup among others) and has created his own process combining the best information on the market along with his own lessons learned from his successful startup to achieve success. Rick has a very innovative way of identifying the heart of your idea then twisting it around on it's head to get from an idea to a viable business. He's been a mentor to me over a period of the past 4 years and I've appreciated his insights over the years. Long story short, he understands startups, he understands business models, he understands customer validation, he understands business development and can help guide you through the most crucial steps of startup success.

Bruce Flory
Technology Commercialization Advisor at McCombs School of Business
August 30, 2012, Richard was a client of Bruce’s

Bruce Flory is blessed with an ability take strategic thinking farther than most strategists... and then convert that into pragmatic, tangible action steps. A very rare gift, in my experience. I have benefited from and learned many things from Bruce, and give him my highest recommendation.  Within one conversation, you will see the value he can bring to your organization, but the fact that he can deliver on the end result is what separates him from really good to an indispensable part of your team.
